author: @jonathanhawes9
title: Cyclone Alfred: New England North West crews on high alert
text:
Emergency crews across the New England North West are ready to respond as Tropical Cyclone Alfred inches closer to making landfall.
Fire and Rescue NSW Zone Commander Tom Cooper has left his Tamworth headquarters to provide operational support at a multi-agency regional emergency operations centre at Coffs Harbour Police Station.
"There's police, rural fire service, SES, marine rescue, Department of Commerce engineers, recovery authority, everybody's here," Superintendent Cooper told the Leader.
The multi-agency operations team will coordinate the response to the cyclone expected to make landfall in southeast Queensland on Friday or early Saturday.
Meanwhile, back in Tamworth, a Fire and Rescue strike team is on standby, ready to be deployed at a moment's notice.
The team on standby consists of four tankers, 16 firefighters, and a taskforce commander.
"A lot of people have been messaging me asking how bad is it and what's going to happen, and no one knows. A cyclone like this is pretty unpredictable, and it is a big one," Superintendent Cooper said
"As for myself, I'm feeling that I'll be able to deal with anything that happens. You just gotta rely on your experience and procedures and see what develops."
Closer to home, several community organisations are also keeping a close eye on how Cyclone Alfred develops.
The Armidale Show and the Barraba Show are both setting up to run this weekend, rain or shine.
The Armidale Show has cancelled its show jumping event due to strong winds forecast for the area but will otherwise plough ahead as normal.
Meanwhile, the Moonbi Showground is preparing for the 2025 Moonbi Kootingal Motor and Historical Machinery Exhibition, though organisers say if there's a lot of rain, the event will be cancelled.
The Kootingal Motor Club encourages motoring enthusiasts to watch its social media for updates.
At the time of publication, Tamworth was forecast to receive up to 4mm of rain on Saturday and 30mm on Sunday.
But tropical cyclones are difficult to predict, so the local SES is getting prepared for all possibilities.
"We're setting up an incident management team here in Tamworth as well, and have crews on standby along the Northern Tablelands as they're anticipating heavy rain into the weekend," NSW SES Deputy Zone Commander Matthew Kirby said.
"We're not sending any crews to the coast due to the risk we have [here], but the coast has resources from across all of NSW to support operations there."
Superintendent Kirby says the SES is also sending crews from Sydney to assist the Northern Tablelands and advises residents to exercise caution.
"Stay out of floodwater. Don't attempt to drive or walk through floodwater," he said.
"Prepare your home now while conditions are benign, and monitor conditions via the SES website and the Hazards Near Me app."

author: ABCNews
title: American-Israeli-Canadian hostage confirmed dead
text:
Judith Weinstein, a 70-year-old American-Israeli-Canadian hostage, was confirmed dead on Thursday, Kibbutz Nir Oz said in a statement.
Weinstein was fatally wounded during Hamas' Oct. 7 attack on Israel and her body remains held in Gaza, the kibbutz said.
Her husband, American-Israeli Gad Haggai, was also killed on Oct. 7 and his body also remains in Gaza, the kibbutz said. His death was confirmed last week.
Weinstein, a mother of four and grandmother of seven, was an English teacher who specialized in helping children with special needs, Kibbutz Nir Oz said.
"For the past few years she has also taught Mindfulness to children and teenagers who suffered from anxiety caused by the ongoing rocket fire from Gaza," the kibbutz said. "Judy was a poet, entrepreneur, and pursued many initiatives to advance peace in the region."
President Joe Biden said in a statement that he's "devastated" to learn of Weinstein's death.
"We are holding Judith and Gad's four children, seven grandchildren, and other loved ones close to our hearts," Biden said. "I will never forget what their daughter, and the family members of other Americans held hostage in Gaza, have shared with me. They have been living through hell for weeks. No family should have to endure such an ordeal. And I reaffirm the pledge we have made to all the families of those still held hostage: we will not stop working to bring them home."
Weinstein was the last American woman being held hostage by Hamas who had not been released, according to the Hostage Families Forum.
President Joe Biden issued the following statement:
"Jill and I are devastated to learn that American Judith Weinstein is also believed to have been killed by Hamas on October 7. This tragic development cuts deep, coming on the heels of last week's news that Judith's beloved husband, Gad Haggai, is believed to have been killed by Hamas. We are holding Judith and Gad's four children, seven grandchildren, and other loved ones close to our hearts. I will never forget what their daughter, and the family members of other Americans held hostage in Gaza, have shared with me. They have been living through hell for weeks. No family should have to endure such an ordeal. And I reaffirm the pledge we have made to all the families of those still held hostage: we will not stop working to bring them home."

author: Tiago Amaral
title: Solana (SOL) Price Falls Below $190 Despite Whale Accumulation
text:
Solana (SOL) price has experienced a sharp decline, falling nearly 11% in the past seven days after failing to break the $220 resistance level. Following that rejection, SOL dropped below the critical $200 threshold, reflecting intensified bearish momentum.
Despite this downturn, whale activity shows signs of renewed accumulation, with large holders steadily increasing their positions over the last five days. These developments indicate the potential for a price rebound, although SOL’s immediate outlook remains under bearish pressure.
SOL Whales Keep Accumulating
The number of addresses holding at least 10,000 https://beincrypto.com/solana-price-falls-amid-lack-of-volatility/ saw a sharp decline from 5,096 to 5,025 between December 28 and January 2, reflecting significant sell-offs among large holders during this period. Tracking these so-called whales is crucial because their buying and selling activities often have a substantial impact on the market.
When whales reduce their holdings, it can indicate a lack of confidence or profit-taking, leading to increased selling pressure and potential downward movements in price.
However, the number of whale addresses has started to recover, increasing from 5,025 on January 2 to 5,098 as of January 8. This rebound suggests renewed accumulation by large investors, which could be a positive sign for Solana price stability or recovery in the near future.
Despite SOL being in a downtrend and losing 14% over the past two days, the growing whale activity may signal improving sentiment and a possible foundation for a price reversal if the trend continues. Such movements often reflect a shift in confidence that could support SOL’s price in the midterm.
Solana DMI Shows Sellers Are In Full Control
The Average Directional Index (ADX) for https://beincrypto.com/solayer-releases-2025-roadmap/ is currently at 42.6, up from 37 just one day ago, indicating a strengthening trend. The ADX measures trend strength on a scale from 0 to 100, regardless of direction, with values above 25 signifying a strong trend and those below 20 reflecting weak or absent momentum.
This rising ADX confirms that SOL’s current downtrend is intensifying, suggesting that bearish momentum is dominating the market.
Further supporting this, the directional indicators show that the +DI, representing buying pressure, has dropped significantly to 10.1 from 31.5 over the last three days, highlighting a sharp decline in bullish activity. Conversely, the -DI, which tracks selling pressure, has surged to 33.1 from 8.6 during the same period, indicating a substantial increase in bearish momentum.
These shifts reinforce the current downtrend and suggest that https://beincrypto.com/learn/solana-price-prediction/ could face continued selling pressure unless buying activity strengthens significantly to counteract the negative sentiment.
SOL Price Prediction: Can It Recover the $200 Threshold?
https://beincrypto.com/learn/solana-projects/ EMA lines indicate a bearish outlook, with short-term EMAs crossing below all longer-term lines one day ago. This death cross is a significant bearish signal, coinciding with a sharp price drop from $200.
If the current downtrend persists, SOL price may test the critical support level at $185. Failure to hold this level could lead to further declines, with $176 as the next key target.
However, recent whale activity provides a glimmer of optimism, as large holders have been steadily accumulating SOL over the past few days. This accumulation could signal growing confidence among major investors, potentially setting the stage for a reversal.
If bullish momentum returns, https://beincrypto.com/sol-holds-strong-support-critical/ could challenge the resistance at $197. A breakout above this level could pave the way for gains toward $211, representing a potential 12.8% recovery from current levels.

author: Troy Kless
title: Fort Bend County car break ins on the rise, sheriff says
text: FORT BEND COUNTY, Texas — If you live or drive in Fort Bend County, officials say vehicle burglaries are on the rise. On Christmas morning, Missouri City resident Alex Bergeron said she was enjoying the day inside with her family until her sister came over. "My sister came in the house and said, 'Why is your back window rolled down?' And I was like, 'Well it shouldn't be,'" Bergeron said. When she went outside, she learned an unwanted visitor had been in her car. "The glass even got to the front. I was just in shock, honestly. So, I went back inside and said, 'Hey, my car got broken into,'" she said. Her doors were locked and all the thieves could see in the back were some jackets. "They didn't take anything, my glove compartments weren't gone through so I'm not sure if someone startled them away," Bergeron said." Fort Bend County Sheriff Eric Fagan said car break-ins are up 9% this month compared to the previous. He recommends simply locking doors and removing every item inside. "It's the holiday season. Thieves want to come out even more because they know individuals are shopping, leaving things in their cars. Let's not make it easy for them," he said. Luckily for Bergeron, she avoids the costly headache of replacing her window. "You never know how it really feels until it happens to you," she said. "It was just a bad feeling and it felt very personal." Other tips from the sheriff include tinting your windows and getting an alarm for window breaks. He said 25% of vehicles that were stolen in the county were left unlocked.

author: @infobae
title: Israel aseguró que Hezbollah hace 40 años ataca a Occidente y lo acusó de planificar una ofensiva similar a la del 7 de octubre - Infobae
text:
Israel aseguró que Hezbollah lleva 40 años atacando al mundo occidental y lo acusó de estar planeando una ofensiva similar a la de octubre (FDI) Las Fuerzas de Defensa de Israel publicaron este jueves un video en el que expusieron algunos de los crímenes cometidos por el grupo terrorista chií libanés Hezbollah en las últimas décadas, recordando al mundo los riesgos de no poner un freno a sus ofensivas .
El material se remonta hasta 1983 , cuando la formación bombardeó la Embajada de Estados Unidos y los cuarteles de las fuerzas de paz internacionales en Beirut, dejando 370 muertos y 270 heridos. Asimismo, recuerda el bombardeo a la Embajada de Israel y la sede de la Asociación Mutual Israelita Argentina (AMIA) en Buenos Aires , en 1992 y 1994 respectivamente, provocando la muerte de 115 personas y provocando heridas en más de 540 civiles.
Hezbollah también estuvo detrás de los bombardeos de 1996 a viviendas de la Fuerza Aérea estadounidense en Arabia Saudita, donde el saldo fue de 19 muertos y 498 heridos, y cuatro años más tarde secuestró y mató a soldados de las FDI , suma el video.
Hezbollah es también responsable del desplazamiento de más de 60.000 israelíes de sus hogares, el lanzamiento de cientos de misiles contra el territorio vecino y la quema de pueblos en el norte (REUTERS) Al presente, el grupo pro iraní es el responsable del desplazamiento de más de 60.000 israelíes de sus hogares en el norte del país, el lanzamiento de cientos de misiles contra el territorio vecino y la quema de pueblos cercanos . Además, Tel Aviv acusó a la formación de estar planeando una ofensiva similar a la que lanzó el grupo terrorista palestino Hamas el pasado 7 de octubre, que dejó al menos 1.200 muertos y 240 rehenes en Israel.
La operación se conoce como “Conquistar Galilea” y lleva por lo menos 20 años en la mente de los terroristas. Con su eje puesto en el norte de Israel, Hezbollah tiene “planes públicos de infiltrarse en Israel, apoderarse de los kibutz, ciudades y bases de las FDI en el norte” , mientras que “las fuerzas Radwan, la élite de Hezbollah, planean asesinar y secuestrar a miles de israelíes usando fuego pesado y su sistema de túneles terroristas subterráneos” , indicó el Ejército.
“Israel no solo lucha contra un enemigo en su frontera. Estamos luchando contra un ejército terrorista que pretende destruir todo el mundo occidental” , aseguraron.
El video se conoció en medio de la escalada de agresiones ordenada por el gabinete de guerra de Benjamin Netanyahu en el límite con El Líbano, ante la falta de una solución diplomática al conflicto en este frente.
Netanyahu insiste en que Israel atacará a Hezbollah "hasta lograr sus objetivos" (EFE) A pesar de los pedidos de la comunidad internacional por un alto el fuego y los más de 600 muertos registrados hasta el momento, en las últimas horas el ministro de Defensa Yoav Gallant aprobó planes para continuar con esta estrategia. “Seguimos con la secuencia de operaciones : eliminar a los terroristas de Hezbollah, desmantelar las formaciones ofensivas y destruir los misiles y cohetes”, sostuvo. “La serie de operaciones en la nueva fase de la guerra continuará hasta que logremos nuestro objetivo : garantizar el regreso seguro de las comunidades del norte de Israel a sus hogares”, insistió.
A la par, al aterrizar en Nueva York, donde participará de la Asamblea General de la ONU este viernes, Netanyahu insistió en que no cesarán sus ofensivas hasta que se pueda garantizar el regreso seguro de los miles de civiles a sus hogares. “Nuestra política es clara y nuestras acciones hablan por sí solas, que nadie se llame al engaño” , dijo.
(Con información de EFE)

author: Beth Jones
title: UPDATE: Mother and daughter have been safely located | Local News | foxbangor.com
text:
UPDATE -- At 12:37 a.m. on Friday, December 29th, an Amber Alert was issued stating the Saco Police Department is cancelling their first Amber Alert because 35-year-old Norma Rodondi Jimbikt and her daughter 3-year-old Angie Rodondi have been safely located. This information has also been confirmed by the Maine State Police.
Below is the original report of the first Amber Alert issued on Thursday night at 9:54 p.m.
SACO -- Maine State Police have issued an Amber Alert for a mother and child abduction in Saco Thursday.
Maine State Police say the child is 3-year-old Angie Rodondi. She is 2-foot-5, weighs about 25 pounds, and has brown hair and brown eyes.
She was last seen wearing a pink dress and a brown top.
Her mother is 35-year-old Norma Rodondi Jimbikt. She is 5-foot-5, weighs about 170 pounds and has brown hair and brown eyes. She was last seen wearing a green shirt, black pants and a black jacket.
Police say the two Biddeford residents were forced into a white Ford Explorer with New York registration by an unidentified male. Then, at 3:41pm Thursday afternoon the vehicle crossed tolls into New York State.
If you have any information please contact the Saco Police Department at 207-284-4535.
